1545520.name: Over Circle
1545520.description:
Over Circle is house escape game that you can play with your friends.
Symbols are the only way to escape to house.
All you have to think about is find the 9 symbols but at this time evil trying to kill you

Be Evil

  • Don't let the others escape the house.
  • Reveal hidden symbols by use your special power. Use symbols to be invisible or increase your speed in this way you can kill them easily

Be Human

  • Symbols are randomly generated each game in the house and their locations shown in the books.
  • You can freeze the evil for a short time.
  • All the while, you need to keep in touch with each other, help your friends, otherwise it won't be too hard to kill you.
